appTitle.description: Header describing the server mount form.

alertMessage.message: Attention! This feature is still in a testing phase, we cannot take responsibility for the potential data loss and all types of issues that might happen during installation, or provide technical support on time. Use at your own risk!
alertMessage.description: Warning to display before using this extension.

configManageLinkText.description: Link to Microsoft Account permissions page.

bugLinkText.message: Submit a bug of OneDrive for FydeOS

mountHeader.description: Header describing the server mount form.

mount.description: Label for a button that triggers the mount action.

mountAttempt.description: Popup notifcation that informs the user that the system is attempting to mount a new instance with the credentials they provided.

mountSuccess.description: Popup notifcation that informs the user that the system successfully mounted a new instance with the credentials they provided.

mountFail.description: Popup notifcation that informs the user that the system failed to mount a new instance with the credentials they provided.
